::Zardus::

The alliance leader lands near Oinker, looking at the bot.

"Welcome," he says in his deadly tone, "I am Zardus, leader of the alliance. 
I trust you will join me peacefully."

Zardus waits for Oinker to respond, hand on his gun just in case.
